response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is priced at $1,200,000. Given its significance to you, this offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to you ($1,000,000) and my valuation of it ($1,500,000). I believe this price offers an excellent balance that maximizes the benefit for both parties. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can finalize this transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
